name: Arbor (G.C. Katz, Cycles, King_Kai258, Nick Halim, smiller77, friedlettuce, jonnydeboy, katiedawky)
name_original: Arbor (G.C. Katz, Cycles, King_Kai258, Nick Halim, smiller77, friedlettuce, jonnydeboy, katiedawky)
description:
After your father leaves for war, tend the tree you planted together. A mini gardening sim about hope, loss, and resilience.

Controls:
WASD to move
E to interact
Q to view task list
I to view inventory

Credits:

Garett Anderson: Programming, game design
Katie Dawkins: Narrative design
Jonathan Dearman: Sound design, music
Ammaar F.: Animation, sprite art
Nick Halim: Sprite art, cultural consultation
Kai Haughton: Art direction, character design, character art
Gwen C. Katz: Production, narrative design, UI art
Guadalupe Martinez: Cutscene art
Sean Miller: Programming, game design
